Fieldhouse said the Ryan plan ignores "lessons learned from the Great Depression and underscored by the Great Recession" and still swears by the failed Bush-era economic policies of cutting taxes for the wealthy while neglecting the middle class and national investments. It even proposes the partial privatization of Social Security, an increase in taxes on the middle class, the elimination of corporate taxes, and the privatization of Medicare. Sen. Defense Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates will soon lift the ban on initiating new cases against Guantanamo detainees in preparation to increase the use of military commissions for prosecution. Imposed on the day of Barack Obama 's inauguration, the overturned ban will be accompanied by "an executive order to create a parole board-like system" to review cases of nearly 50 detainees who would be held without trial. On his official blog, Mr Zahi Hawass , wrote: I have said that if the Egyptian Museum is safe, Egypt is safe. However, I am now concerned Egypt is not safe. But he later added: "Not a single thing has been thrown at the museum by the thousands of protesters in Tahrir Square, because these people do not want to damage their cultural heritage."
